control.name: Protection against malicious software
control.desc:
Malicious software can be thought of as any program that harms information systems, such as: viruses, Trojan horses or worms. As a result of an unauthorized infiltration, EPHI and other data can be damaged or destroyed, or at minimum, require expensive and time-consuming repairs.

To solve this risk, implement procedures for guarding against, detecting and reporting, found malicious software in our systems. All workforce members must be regularly trained and reminded about this process.
